userInterfaces

Class ConsoleIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • userInterfaces.ConsoleIO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InputOutputInterface

    public class ConsoleIO
extends java.lang.Object
implements InputOutputInterface
    A class with the input and output methods to read a String, read an int, output a message, and display a list of choices from which the user must select the index of a choice. The input and output is done via the console.

      • readChoice

        public int readChoice(java.lang.String[] options)
        Display the list of options and read an int that is the index of one of the options. The first option is the default.
        Specified by:
        readChoice in interface InputOutputInterface
        Parameters:
        options - an array with the options that are presented to the user
        Returns:
        the int specifying the array index for the option selected by the user

        Specified by:
